text: - What is going on, everyone?

I have a very exciting

Jamaica and Saudi Arabia,
country number 196 and 197.

This is a been a lifelong goal

And it's been incredible
to be able to document

the experience and share it

And even if there was a pandemic

it looks like, fingers crossed,
that it will be accomplished.

And I can't wait to
cross that finish line.

It's just something that
I've always dreamed of
since I was a kid, you know.

My parents bought me a globe

I would spin the globe and

the Seven Wonders of the
World and faraway places.

And so I'm very grateful
for this community,
for all you guys out there.
I'm very excited for what's ahead.

And I'm very pumped for the
